story_28_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hmph! It appears they’ve strengthened their
defenses since our last incursion, haven’t they.
story_28_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Um, ma’am! D’you think the members coming from
the hideout shoulda been here by now?
story_28_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
No need to worry. They’ll be here.
In the meantime...
story_28_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Everyone, go after [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
They can’t have a match without [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]!
story_28_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Heh! You mighta been good enough to make it
to the semifinals...
story_28_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: but you’ve got no chance against our numbers!
story_28_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
How dare you try to destroy my Pokémon
Masters League...
story_28_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I won’t just stand here and let you do whatever
you want with it!
story_28_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: And Cynthia, too! Where did she come from?
story_28_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Hmph! I see that I still have a few bugs left to
squash. These fools just don’t know when to stop,
do they!
story_28_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
You! Go link up with the arena security! I’ll handle
these thugs.
story_28_03000/2401_1001_2000_10: Oh? Will you be all right on your own?
story_28_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: Of course! Who do you think I am?!
story_28_03000/2401_1001_2400_10: Uh-huh. And he still looks as smug as ever.
story_28_03000/2401_1001_2500_10: B-but look at that Pokémon he has with him!
story_28_03000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I’m sure you’re full of questions right now, but
before we get to that, we need to take care of
Team Break!
story_28_03000/2401_0401_2800_10:
Yes! If we all work together, we’ll have this
situation under control in no time!
story_28_03000/2401_0402_3000_10:
That’s the spirit! I’m sure Lear’s feeling just as
courageous now knowing you’re here fighting by
his side.
story_28_03000/2401_1001_3100_10: All right! Let’s give this everything we’ve got!
